overview: When the villainous Mr. Wink and Mr. Fibb extend the adult swimtime in the neighbourhood pool the Kids Next Door are sent a red alert to stop them. Numbuh One suggests employing the Kid-A-Pault, a Kid's Next Door weapon to put an end to this tyranny...But their plan fails, leaving them to find other means of battling Mr Wink and Mr Fibb.
title: No P in the O.O.L.
